scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Presentation of Christ Child in the Temple. The Virgin Mary, in a blue robe, presents the Christ Child to a bearded man in bishop's attire, who holds a chalice. Joseph, in a purple and orange robe, stands to the left, holding a dove. Two women in green and yellow robes stand to the right and left respectively, and another figure in a blue headdress is visible behind Joseph. The figures are positioned within an interior space with a pink brick wall and arched windows with latticework. The floor is tiled in a green and black checkerboard pattern. The scene is framed by a decorative border.
